channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Retirement, There's Finally Time to Cherish the Past
item.description: A trip to a childhood home. Boxes of old letters. A storage room filled with artificats from long ago. The memories they evoke have never felt so dear...

item.title: Factbox-US companies tweak diversity policies as challenges mount
China Needs More Factory Robots. Can It Build Its Own?
item.description: Local production of industrial robots is rising, but Japanese and European makers still have a role.

item.title: Icahn Enterprises stock hits 52-week low at $12.7 amid downturn
Americans Are Really, Really Bullish on Stocks
item.description: The surging stock market has minted millionaires and helped send many Americans’ net worth sharply higher. Many are betting that the rally has more ro...

item.title: JPMorgan raises Plymouth Industrial REIT target to $24
Japan Bank Shares Rise as 10-Year JGB Yield Hits Nearly One-Month High
item.description: Japanese bank stocks rose as the yield on the 10-year Japanese government bonds touched near a one-month high.

item.title: NextEra Energy stock hits 52-week high at $81.08
Stock Futures Are Little Changed as Investors Await Jobs Report Later This Week
item.description: U.S. stock and bond markets were closed for Labor Day. Germany’s DAX index closed at a record high.

item.title: Flag Ship Acquisition Corp enters material agreement
